simplifiedChinese.title: What More Could We Possibly Need?
simplifiedChinese.Question1: Consider the acts of God described in this passage.
simplifiedChinese.Question2: What do these illustrate about the ways of God?
simplifiedChinese.Question3: Have you experienced these ways of God in your life? If yes, how so? If not, what can you do to experience this?
simplifiedChinese.Question4: What can you do to grow in your desire to know and follow God more intimately this week?
